Want to watch it in Safari, without Flash? Turn on Safari’s Develop menu, then choose Develop → User Agent → Mobile Safari 3.2.2 — iPad.

Sidenote in John Gruber’s link to the Maddow Stewart interview.

MSNBC are doing it wrong. Rather than serving content in different formats to specific devices it should be sent to support and HTML5 video should take priority over Flash when the support is present.
